commandDescription: Merge back csv files into globalvaluesettranslations
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv files. Default: '%s'
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output globalvaluesettranslations. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify a globalvaluesettranslation dir in input. Example: MyGlobalValueSet-en_US
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
